title: You have to be Level 12 or higher to post a comment
body:
Looks like I have to create a discussion to solve the problem. So, don't wonder, hopefully this works.

Edit:
I am confused. I am able to post a comment here but not in discussions like "Quick Gameplay Thoughts".
Am I doing something wrong?

Edit 2:

Works now, Whatever happened :D

replies.body: It can take a moment for your account to sync up with the boards.  It looks like you're showing as 30 now, so everything should be good to go!
